txt.en: Return the shiny ball to Envus in Galtrev

'I am now a mighty Wizard, thanks to you! I will take over Dunland first, and Saruman will know that he has a force to contend with as a neighbour. Soon, I will conquer Isengard...and then all of Middle-earth!\n\n'But first, [placeholder], I must defeat you. All of Dunland will fall under my sway, and here it will start!'
'Ahahaha! You cannot escape, [placeholder]! The great Wizard Rook the Many-hued has declared his intent, and now it will all come to pass!'
'You found my shiny ball! Oh, thank you, [placeholder]! I am going to go play. Good-bye!'
Once a Servant, Now a Wizard
Rook, a former servant of Isengard, now feels that he is a fully equipped Wizard.
You have taken back the toy ball, the ring, and the cloak
Defeat the evil Wizard and take back the \qmagical\q items he stole
It would seem that Rook has taken a bit of an evil turn now that he sees himself as a fully accomplished Wizard.\n\nYou should defeat Rook before he tries to hold to any of his promises.
Bring the shiny ball to Envus in Galtrev
Envus is in Galtrev, still without her stolen toy ball.\n\nYou should return the toy ball to Envus, who has been without it long enough.
